markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Experienced Tracker](/Feats.aspx?ID=780) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 261 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

Tracking is second nature to you, and when necessary you can follow a trail without pause. You can Track while moving at full Speed by taking a –5 penalty to your Survival check. If you’re a master in Survival, you don’t take the –5 penalty. If you’re legendary in Survival, you no longer need to roll a new Survival check every hour when tracking, though you still need to roll whenever there are significant changes in the trail.

<title level="2">Experienced Tracker leads to...</title>
[Swift Tracker](/Feats.aspx?ID=512)
name: Experienced Tracker
